name: Blackened steel bracelets
data: It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It decreases the users charisma unbelievably much.
It has nice armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'eternal shielding'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'shielding of death'.
